mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tac_job_board WHERE board_type = #{board_type}
SELECT b.*, m.nickname FROM tac_job_board b JOIN t_member m ON b.mem_code = m.mem_code WHERE b.board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tac_job_board (board_type, mem_code, title, content) VALUES (#{board_type}, #{mem_code}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE tac_job_board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updated_at=NOW() WHERE board_id=#{board_id}
UPDATE tac_job_board SET view_count=view_count+1 WHERE board_id=#{board_id}
UPDATE tac_job_board SET recommend_count=recommend_count+1 WHERE board_id=#{board_id}
